name: The Restoration of Eiganjo // Architect of Restoration
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Fox Monk

card_faces.name: The Restoration of Eiganjo
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I - Search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
II — You may discard a card. When you do, return target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

card_faces.name: Architect of Restoration
card_faces.oracle_text:
Vigilance

—Onyx-Eye, architect of Eiganjo
